```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyr)
mtcars
dtcars <- as.data.table(mtcars)
dtcars

# 选择行
dtcars <- dtcars[hp > 90 & cyl <= 4]
head(dtcars)

# 排序
dtcars <- dtcars[order(disp)]
head(dtcars)

#选择列
dtcars <- dtcars[, .(wt,qsec)]
head(dtcars)


```
